name: Golf (Anger Productions)
overview: The object of the game is to play a round of golf on a 14 hour, part 72 course known as Archdale Golf club. Hole 4, 9 and 13 are par 3. Holes 4, 11 and 16 are par 5 and the remainder are par 4. Screen prompts will be provided throughout the game and should be strictly followed. Weather conditions will impact the game, PGA rules are followed, and your handicap needs to be entered before play.
